long_description: Offering a stable platform, the Ergon GP1 BioKork handlebar grips use natural cork to enhance comfort and support under your palms when mountain biking, commuting or just riding about. Use of cork offers lightweight, natural damping to help reduce the impact of vibrations; textured pads enhance grip. Grips provide optimal pressure distribution under the palms; specific right and left design ensures proper support. Aluminum end clamps provide easy and secure installation. The GP1 BioKork handlebar grips use cork sourced from sustainable forests and plastic that is reinforced with natural fiber; aluminum clamp is recycleable. Requires 130mm of bar space on each side of standard shifters (L size) or 95mm on each side for GripShift(R) (S size), requires standard diameter of 22.2mm.
short_description: Offering a stable platform, the Ergon GP1 BioKork handlebar grips use natural cork to enhance comfort and support under your palms when mountain biking, commuting or just riding about.
